name: Radioactive Adventure
description:
This game was created for the Mini Jam 76, with the theme of radiation. The aim of the game is to get the diamond from the nuclear power plant and exit before your radiation gets too high and kills you. The controls (also mentioned in the tutorial) are:

A and D - move left and right

Space-Bar - jump

E - use door/pickup diamond

Q - zoom out

I created the scripts, and the pixel-art but the rest of the credit goes to William for The music  and the idea for the game
